name: ICT
text: Typically the 10 ICT (Information Communication Tech.) Basics courses span digital technologies associated with web development, multi-media, word processing, chart, database, Internet devices, cyber security, video games, and computer coding.

name: Mathematics
text: Issues in mathematics that many educated person should know to process, evaluate, and understand the numerical and graphical information in our society.

name: Physics
text: A great intro to the scientific method and some major in physics, including makes and motion, energy, gravity, electricity and magnetism, thermodynamics, and optics. Hands-on activities and projects are an important part of this course which aims to prepare future teachers to bring research activities to their classes. 3 lecture hrs and 1 75-minute activity period.

name: MS Word
text: Individuals will learn to use Microsoft Phrase to produce professional-looking documents. Features integrated are typing, format, editing, document space, margins, page numbering and saving a document.
